pr_title: Handle logged out case for Deeplink & Push Notifications

timeline.bodyHTML:
IMO, the following code is more appropriate.

    @NonNull
    public Intent getLogInIntent(@Nullable DeepLink deepLink) {
        return LoginActivity.newIntent(deepLink);
    }

    @NonNull
    public Intent getLogInIntent() {
        return getLogInIntent(null);
    }
timeline.author: farhan-arshad-dev
